p: For SF-WCE, live C decreases by 16% from the early 20 th c. to the mid 20 th c., dead C increases 7% from the late 20 th to the late 21 st c., and ecosystem C decreases by 2% from the early 20 th to the late 21 st c. ( Fig 9Aâ€“9C, Table 7). Over the same period, the live to dead C ratio decreases from 0.55 to 0.42 ( Fig 9D, Table 7).
